availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Union County, Kentucky, merchant. Virginia native. Married to Marcy C. Green. Father of Winifred Green and Simeon Green. Owned four enslaved persons in 1860. Merchant in Union County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Union County, p. 33.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Union County, p. 205.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Union County, Morganfield District, p. 19.
